product_name: Tretorn Snolega Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Take on cold, snowy weather in the snug comfort of the Tretorn Snolega winter boots. Water-resistant exteriors and Thinsulate(TM) linings make sure your feet never feel the chill. Waterproof rubber uppers cover feet; water-resistant nylon uppers extend to mid-calf. Wool lines the footbed of each boot while soft synthetic fabric with Thinsulate lines the shaft for reliable insulation. OrthoLite(R) insoles and rubber midsoles provide cushioning and support; rubber outsoles provide traction on varied surfaces. Tretorn Snolega winter boots feature adjustable cord laces for a snug, secure fit. Closeout.
short_description: Take on cold, snowy weather in the snug comfort of the Tretorn Snolega winter boots. Water-resistant exteriors and Thinsulate(TM) linings make sure your feet never feel the chill.
